about_the_game:
STACK-eRZ is a Roguelite game that follow the story of a mercenary for hire.

Gameplay

In this game you will be able to equip your character with several accessories that alter how your attacks and powers work in order to clear randomly chosen zones for you to discover and fight the enemies within it. STACK-eRZ also includes leveling system and upgrading your character after at the base of operations.

About STACK-eRZ

STACK-eRZ is a roguelite game which uses isometric view with a cyberpunk and at times cartoonish visuals. The leveling system is based on Role Playing Games in which you can have a quick way to boost your character depending on the situation you are in.

Key Features:

  • 11 bosses

  • 60+ zones/maps

  • 50 character altering accessories

  • 200 different items

  • 32 enemy types

  • 111 passive skill points

  • Roguelite elements

  • Unlocking mechanics

  • Achievements

  • 4 playable characters

  • 4 different skills for each character

  • Quests/Contracts for additional rewards

name: STACK-eRZ

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10,11
  • Processor: Core i5-2380P
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10,11
  • Processor: Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: STACK-eRZ is a semi randomly generated action RPG which includes swords,magic and a lot more skills. Gear up your mercenary bot with powerful accessories and equipment to defeat monsters, complete contracts, level up, solve puzzles and ultimately destroy bosses that stand in your way.
